templatewizard-cancel:
Text for the cancel button that closes the dialogue window.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
templatewizard-default:
Text appended to a parameter field's help text to show the parameter's default value. Parameter $1 is the default value.
{{Identical|Default}}
templatewizard-dialog-title: Title of the TemplateWizard dialog window.
templatewizard-insert:
Text for the main template-insertion button.
{{Identical|Insert}}
templatewizard-invalid-title: Error message shown when an invalid title is entered in the search field.
templatewizard-invalid-values:
Error message shown when template-insertion button is clicked but there are invalid fields.
Options are to keep editing ({{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-edit}}) or continue anyway ({{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-insert}}).
templatewizard-invalid-values-edit: Text for button with which to return to editing the template form. Other option is {{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-insert}}.
templatewizard-invalid-values-insert: Text for button with which to ignore invalid fields and insert the template as-is. Other options is {{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-edit}}.
templatewizard-no-templatedata:
Error message shown when the requested template exists and does not have TemplateData. Parameters:
* $1 Template name without 'Template:'.
* $2 URL of the TemplateData help page on MediaWiki.org.
* $3 URL of the TemplateWizard help page on MediaWiki.org.
templatewizard-opens-in-new-tab: Tooltip shown for the template name link.
templatewizard-parameters-optional: Fieldset legend for the set of optional template parameters.
templatewizard-parameters-required: Fieldset legend for the set of required template parameters.
templatewizard-parameters-suggested: Fieldset legend for the set of suggested template parameters.
templatewizard-placeholder-default: Form input placeholder text that shows the parameter's default value.
templatewizard-placeholder-example: Form input placeholder text that shows an example of a value for the parameter.
templatewizard-select-template: Label for the template search field.
templatewizard-template-not-found:
Error message shown when the requested template does not exist. Parameters:
* $1 Template name without 'Template:'.
* $2 URL of the TemplateData help page on MediaWiki.org.
* $3 URL of the TemplateWizard help page on MediaWiki.org.
templatewizard-use:
Text for the template search box selection button.
{{Identical|Use}}
